title: Drawing, Design for a Square Mahogany Dining Table, April 21, 1905
title_raw: Design for a Square Mahogany Dining Table
markings:
Stamped in blue ink, upper right corner: Apr 21 1905
Watermark: ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and red ink, upper center of image: Top 4'3" square, and at bottom center of image: Mahogany Ex.
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Square molded table top raised on molded slightly flaring suppor decorated with dentils and Greek key motifs at bottom, standing atop molded base raised on 4 carved bun feet.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for a Square Mahogany Dining Table, April 21, 1905. Graphite on thin, cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-131
